    已过时。

    @Deprecated
public abstract class TransportSingleItemBulkWriteAction<Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Response extends ReplicationResponse & WriteResponse>
extends TransportWriteAction<Request,Request,Response>
    use transport bulk action directly

      • shardOperationOnPrimary

        protected TransportWriteAction.WritePrimaryResult<Request,Response> shardOperationOnPrimary(Request request,
                                                                                            IndexShard primary)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: TransportWriteAction
        Called on the primary with a reference to the primary IndexShard to modify.
        指定者:
        shardOperationOnPrimary 在类中 TransportWriteAction<Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Response extends ReplicationResponse & WriteResponse>
        参数:
        request - the request to the primary shard
        primary - the primary shard to perform the operation on
        返回:
        the result of the operation on primary, including current translog location and operation response and failure async refresh is performed on the primary shard according to the Request refresh policy
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        从类复制的说明: TransportWriteAction

        shardOperationOnReplica 在类中 TransportWriteAction<Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Response extends ReplicationResponse & WriteResponse>
        参数:
        replicaRequest - the request to the replica shard
        replica - the replica shard to perform the operation on
        返回:
        the result of the operation on replica, including current translog location and operation response and failure async refresh is performed on the replica shard according to the ReplicaRequest refresh policy
        抛出:
